name: Boxes
pages: A box is a special kind of iota, hiding its contents from Nature for later use. I could use these to work around iotas that sometimes disintegrate, such as entities Nature isn't actively thinking about.

pages.text: Wraps an iota in a box for my later use. All that can be seen from the outside of a boxed iota is its type, so it'd be best for me to $(l:hexcasting:addon/hexmu/inscription.json)inscribe/$ my boxes with something meaningful.
Returns me the contents of a box. I feel that certain boxes may have special effects when unboxing...
I have no clue what this does. It creates a box, yes, but am I sure I want to look inside?
